TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonQuickAccessToolBar extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示一律顯示在視窗框架中，可用於存取一般指令的功能區工具列。

span.span: Represents a ribbon toolbar that is always visible in the window frame to provide access to common commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您加入要藉由指定的內容控制項屬性使用 XAML[屬性項目語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。You add a to a control by specifying it as the content of the property using XAML [Property Element Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). ``` ... ``` 下列清單顯示的一般位置階層中的功能區項目。The following list shows the typical placement of the in the hierarchy of ribbon elements. - - 屬性 property - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下列範例會示範一個簡單的功能區，由 Visual Studio 2010 範本的 [說明] 窗格與新增的快速存取工具列項目。The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbondefault)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定父代上控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷類別。It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
